Description: On I-95 at mile marker 149.1 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On Rt. 631 in the County of Charles City, in the vicinity of Adkins Rd; Rt. 618N/S (Charles City County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-195 at mile marker 2.6 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
